code: import React,{useState,useMemo}from"react";import courses from"../data/courses.json";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Courses(){const[query,setQuery]=useState("");const[semester,setSemester]=useState("");const filteredCourses=useMemo(()=>{return courses.filter(course=>{const matchesQuery=course.name.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase())||course.description.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase());const matchesSemester=semester?course.semester===semester:true;return matchesQuery&&matchesSemester;});},[query,semester]);const semesters=Array.from(new Set(courses.map(c=>c.semester))).sort().reverse();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6 max-w-6xl mx-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-[#cc0033] mb-6 text-center",children:"Courses"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col md:flex-row md:items-center gap-4 mb-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search by course name or description...",value:query,onChange:e=>setQuery(e.target.value),className:"border border-gray-300 p-2 rounded w-full md:w-1/2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:semester,onChange:e=>setSemester(e.target.value),className:"border border-gray-300 p-2 rounded w-full md:w-40",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"All Semesters"}),semesters.map(s=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:s,children:s},s))]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6",children:filteredCourses.map((course,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white shadow rounded-xl p-5 border border-gray-200 text-left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-lg font-bold mb-1",children:course.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-500 mb-1",children:["Semester: ",course.semester]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-700",children:course.description})]},idx))})]});}
